metadata.title: CVE-2020-23452 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Selenium Grid v3.141.59allows attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML via a craftedpayload injected into the hub parameter under the /grid/console page.

criterions.comment: python-selenium package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
